alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Lawrence (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 12:59PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A BAND OF SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN COLUMBIANA...NORTHERN BEAVER AND SOUTHWESTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 1256 PM EST, a band of lake effect snow showers were located 7 miles northeast of East Palestine, shifting north at 15 mph. Heavier snow showers within this band will support reduced visibility and quick accumulation on roadways. Locations impacted include... New Castle, Beaver Falls, Monaca, East Palestine, Ellwood City, New Brighton, Beaver, Rochester, Ohioville, Oakwood, Industry, and New Castle Northwest. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 1 and 19. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 12 and 40. Snow will lead to reduced visibilities and hazardous travel conditions.
